summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Violence Against Women Act; authorizing an agreement with the Washington State Office of Crime Victims' Advocacy for financial assistance in the amount of Two Hundred Thirty-One Thousand One Hundred and Twenty-Two Dollars ($231,122) for the administration and operation of programs and services to address domestic violence and sexual assault by the Department of Housing and Human Services (DHHS); increasing expenditure allowances in the 1998 budget of DHHS; making a reimbursable appropriation; creating a position in DHHS; ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
